In England, in the seven days to 14 August, there were 174,303 new confirmed cases (308.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 August, there were 169,658 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (4,645 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 August is 5,579,087 (9,865.7 cases per 100,000 population).
